#OTD in 1948: a USAF cargo C-47 [43-49534] crashes in Berlin (W. Germany). All 2 aboard die, 3 injured on the ground. On the final approach to Tempelhof, aircraft hit roof of a building and went down on a suburban area. Aircraft was taking part in the Berlin Airlift. https://t.co/OG8sRRN5pc
